page.title: 09Clubs for children
page.content: {CUBS: }The 12th Dumfriesshire Canonbie pack meet on Fridays in the village hall at 6.30pm to play games and receive instruction. After an inspection for neatness, they usually play cub games.Sometimes they go down to the park to study trees and leaves. Cubs pay 20p each week. {GUIDES: }The guides of Canonbie were founded in 1984. They meet in Canonbie Primary School at 6.30pm to 8.15pm during the school term. There are 14 guides in the company. There are two adults, called guiders, to run the pack.Guides pay 30p each week. {BROWNIES:} The brownies meet on Mondays at 6.30pm in the primary school. There are 20 brownies grouped in 'sixes'. Each brownie brings 15p a week. They play brownie games, prepare work for badges and occasionally practise for brownie concerts.
